name: Crystal (CesarZ)
description:
[Please note that this game is still in an early development stage, however you can play Chapter 1 demo now]

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

Crystal is the reflection of a colorful world but it doesn't always have to be this way.

A strategic and interactive adventure game focused on the wonderful colorful world

Help Square discover new places, challenges, and recover lost memories. Along the way you will find other shapes, puzzles, new worlds, mysteries and much more!

Features
  • Five chapters each with different gameplay and story
  • Complete many challenges and solve various puzzless
  • Explore the worlds and find a variety of things
  • Find and expand your collection of your adventure blog
  • Many interactive possibilities
  • A relaxing soundtrack and smooth design
  • A mysterious story...

Your adventure begins at the rebirth of Square in Crystal.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

System Requirements
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer 
  • RAM: 4 GB
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Monitor: 1024x576 minimum

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
